original_text: So now a gift is waiting for me. The Lord will make me completely right with him. That will be like a crown which the Lord will give me on that great day when he judges people. He is the judge who is fair and right. He will not only give that gift to me. He will give it to all those people who love him. They will be happy to see him when he comes again.
korean_text: 이제 후로는 나를 위하여 의의 면류관이 예비되었으므로 주 곧 의로우신 재판장이 그 날에 내게 주실 것이며 내게만 아니라 주의 나타나심을 사모하는 모든 자에게도니라

sentences.original_text: So now a gift is waiting for me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 이제 나를 위해 선물이 기다리고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord will make me completely right with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 나를 자신과 완전히 옳은 관계로 만드실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: That will be like a crown
which the Lord will give me
on that great day when he judges people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 사람들을 심판하실 그 위대한 날에.

sentences.original_text: He will not only give that gift to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 선물을 나에게만 주시지 않을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will give it to all those people who love him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 그를 사랑하는 모든 사람들에게 주실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They will be happy to see him
